pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'Azure Maps' API // Provides a wrapper for the Microsoft 'Azure Maps' REST APIs https://learn.microsoft.com/en- us/rest/api/maps/route?view=rest-maps-2025-01-01, enabling users to access mapping and geospatial services directly from R. This package simplifies authenticating, building, and sending requests for services like route directions. It handles conversions between R objects (such as 'sf' objects) and the GeoJSON+JSON format required by the API, making it easier to integrate 'Azure Maps' into R-based data analysis workflows.
